Text.Language: Twbh m~Po#c# e~h~r/i e~jwn: w~ niselet n~te P,#c#: Barbara nem Iwliana: n~tef ,a nennobi nan e~bol.
Pray to the Lord on our behalf, O brides of Christ, Barbara and Juliana, that He may forgive us our sins.
